1 #include <stdio.h>
 2 #include <stdlib.h>
 3 
 4 
 5 void mandelbrot(double c_real, double c_imag){
 6     unsigned int i, niter = 100000;
 7     unsigned short threshold = 4;
 8     double temp; // otherwise y would be updated with new value of x
 9     double x = c_real, y = c_imag; // z_real = x, z_imag = y; z0 = c
10     
11     for (i = 0; i < niter; i++){
12         // z² + c = (x + yi)² + (a + bi) = (x² - y² + 2xyi) + (a + bi)
13         // z² + c = (x² - y² + a) + (2xy + b)i
14         temp = x;
15         x = (x*x) - (y*y) + c_real; // real part of z² + real part of c
16         y = (2*temp*y) + c_imag; // imag part of z² + imag part of c
17 
18         // actually |z| = sqrt(x² + y²) > 2, but we can square the absolute
19         // value to avoid calculating the root -> |z|² > 4
20         if ((x*x) + (y*y) > threshold){
21             printf(" ");
22             return;
23         }
24     }
25     printf(".");
26     return;
27 }
28 
29 
30 int main(){
31     int n = 80, m = 40; // terminal size (height = n; width = m + 1)
32     int c_imag_start = -1, c_imag_end = 1;
33     int c_real_start = -2, c_real_end = 1;
34     double c_real, c_imag;
35 
36     // stepsize along imag and real axis; needs cast->otherwise int division
37     double c_imag_stepsize = (double) (abs(c_imag_start) + abs(c_imag_end)) / m;
38     double c_real_stepsize = (double) (abs(c_real_start) + abs(c_real_end)) / n;
39     
40     for (unsigned int a = 0; a <= m; a++){
41         c_imag = c_imag_start + c_imag_stepsize*a;
42         for (unsigned int b = 0; b <= n; b++){
43             c_real = c_real_start + c_real_stepsize*b;
44             mandelbrot(c_real, c_imag);
45         }
46         printf("\n");
47     }
48     
49     return 0;
50 }
